detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
All-in-one suit in soft pile with a zip down the front and along one leg, a lined hood with sewn-on ears, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Jersey lining.
Imitation leather ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 8 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid, V-shaped waist, wide sides and a high cut at the back.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1 cm to 3.1 cm.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.

Nursing blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a unique nursing feature, round neck and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Set with a sleeveless romper suit in velour made from an organic cotton blend and a long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey. Romper suit with buttoned shoulder straps, a small pocket at the front and full feet with elastic around the heels. Patterned top with lapped shoulders.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, an opening at the top, tasselled ties and a rounded hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in sturdy denim with hard worn details, a high waist and straight, wide legs.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front and high waist with ties at one side.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and slits in the sides of the hem.
Brogues in imitation suede with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, linings and insoles in patterned fabric and rubber soles.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Body in lace and mesh with a push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit. Fleece lining.

Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
A-line dress in plumeti cotton with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, concealed pockets in the side seams and short cap sleeves with double, flared flounces. Unlined.
Cotton twill trousers with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, a fake fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with a small bow at the neckline and short, flounced sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist and gathered frills at the hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and a wrapover, double-layered hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pair of airy, ribbed leggings in a soft silk blend with an elasticated waist and extra-long legs.
Metal hoop earrings with leaf-shaped pendants. Length 6 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Warm-lined biker boots with a zip in one side and a decorative tab with a metal buckle at the front. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft cotton jersey, three with a print motif on the front.
Vest tops in soft, stretch cotton jersey.
Kimono in patterned satin with low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length cuffed sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Relaxed-fit shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with a soft, stretchy shaft, round toes and covered block heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 6 cm.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a grandad collar and covered buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Playsuit in satin with lace details, a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Ties at the sides and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Nylon bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, front pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Short cycling shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in soft pile with a high stand-up collar, concealed zip down the front, side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Short, slightly boxy jacket in washed denim with worn details, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, dropped shoulders and sleeves with frayed, raw-edge cuffs with a slit. Tab with adjustable button fastenings at the sides.
Bikini top with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back.
Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Playsuit in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, an opening down the back and button at the back of the neck. Pompoms around the armholes, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a large zipped compartment with a carabiner hook and woven handle on the front. Zipped compartment at the back, an inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Size 5x18x32 cm.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar and ties at the top, a yoke at the back, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Flared skirt in a cotton weave with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the waist, and sequins to the hem. Lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short cap sleeves, a chest pocket with glitter and appliqués, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short, sleeveless jersey dress in a narrow cut at the top with a covered button at the back of the neck, short, narrow shoulder straps and a cut-out section at the back. Lined at the top.

Fully lined swimsuit with a gently rounded neckline at the front and a low-cut, rounded neckline at the back. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey.
Playsuit in soft organic cotton slub jersey with short raglan sleeves, a decorative bow at the waist and narrow elastication around the neckline, waist and sleeves.
Trousers in a cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and side pockets. Legs that can be rolled up and fastened with a tab and button.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey.
Jacket in soft cotton twill with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Zipped side pockets and a press-stud at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a decorative back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder, and one narrow shoulder strap.

Down jacket in nylon with a light sheen and lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, side pockets and an elasticated drawstring at the rounded hem. Lined. Filling 90% down, 10% feathers.

Super push-up bras in microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Single-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar and short sleeves.

Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 70% down and 30% feathers. Lined, detachable hood with press-studs at the front and a detachable faux fur trim. Stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, two zipped chest pockets, two flap patch pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and an inner pocket. Adjustable tab and inner ribbing at the cuffs and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Twisted detail at the front of the hem and a ribbed trim at the back of the hem.
Jacket in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
